instruction: Please provide a plan for a Thanksgiving event. Generate 5 images showing the decoration, activity, and food areas and so on.
sub_caption: A welcoming entrance adorned with an array of colorful pumpkins, gourds, and dried corn stalks. A rustic wooden sign reads "Happy Thanksgiving" in elegant script. Warm string lights are draped around the doorway, creating a cozy autumn ambiance.

An inviting dining area with a long table covered in a rich, autumn-hued tablecloth. Traditional Thanksgiving dishes are artfully arranged, including a golden roast turkey, cranberry sauce, and various pies. Handwritten thank-you cards serve as place settings, adding a personal touch to each seat.

A cozy gratitude corner featuring a large chalkboard where guests can write what they're thankful for. Comfortable armchairs and throw pillows in warm fall colors surround the area. A basket filled with colored chalk and a "Count Your Blessings" banner complete the heartwarming setup.

An elegantly arranged seating area with multiple round tables dressed in fall-themed linens. Each table is adorned with a centerpiece of mini pumpkins, pinecones, and autumn leaves. Name cards with hand-drawn turkeys guide guests to their seats, while soft candlelight creates a warm atmosphere.

A festive refreshment station offering Thanksgiving-themed drinks and snacks. A large dispenser contains spiced apple cider, surrounded by cinnamon sticks and apple slices for garnish. A tiered stand displays pumpkin spice cookies, maple pecan bars, and other seasonal treats. Rustic wooden signs label each item.

instruction: Please provide a plan for a Dragon Boat Festival celebration. Generate 5 images showing the decoration, activity, and food areas and so on.
sub_caption: A welcoming entrance to the Dragon Boat Festival celebration. Large bamboo poles frame the gateway, adorned with colorful ribbons. On either side, tables display artfully arranged zongzi (rice dumplings) of various flavors. Bundles of fresh mugwort and calamus hang above, filling the air with a fragrant aroma. A traditional Chinese lantern with "端午节" (Dragon Boat Festival) written on it hangs in the center.

The main celebration area, featuring a life-sized dragon boat model as the centerpiece. Around it, stalls showcase traditional foods like realgar wine, five-color dumplings, and xionghuang cake. Informational placards explain the significance of each item. Strings of red lanterns crisscross overhead, creating a festive atmosphere. Children gather around a table learning to wrap zongzi under the guidance of an elderly volunteer.

An interactive Dragon Boat Festival experience zone. A mini water pool holds scaled-down dragon boats where visitors can practice paddling techniques. Nearby, a craft area allows guests to make their own sachets filled with fragrant herbs. A face-painting station offers designs of dragons and other festival symbols. In one corner, a storyteller captivates an audience with tales of Qu Yuan and the origins of the festival.

A spacious seating area for guests to relax and enjoy the festivities. Long tables covered in red cloths are arranged in rows, each decorated with centerpieces of lotus flowers and miniature dragon boats. Traditional folding fans serve as place settings. A stage at the front is set up for cultural performances, with a backdrop depicting a serene river scene. To one side, a tea ceremony area offers a quiet space for reflection.

A vibrant refreshment zone featuring Dragon Boat Festival-themed treats. A central counter offers chilled realgar wine and sweet rice wines in decorative cups. Food stalls serve modern twists on traditional fare, such as zongzi-flavored ice cream and dragon boat-shaped pastries. A dessert table displays an array of colorful mochi and fruit-based sweets. Hanging baskets filled with aromatic herbs add to the sensory experience, while staff members in traditional attire serve guests.

prompt: FIVE-PANEL Images with a 1x5 grid layout depicting a Tree Planting Day event with cohesive environmental themes and community engagement.All images maintain a vibrant, educational aesthetic with greenery, eco-friendly elements, and consistent use of earthy tones to emphasize environmental stewardship. PANEL-1:A welcoming entrance adorned with lush potted plants, banners reading 'Celebrate Tree Planting Day', and rows of seedlings arranged neatly on wooden stands. Sunlight filters through leafy arches, casting playful shadows on the path, while volunteers guide attendees with smiling gestures. PANEL-2:An interactive tree-planting zone with shovels, watering cans, and soil bags organized around demonstration plots. Children and adults kneel to plant saplings, guided by instructional signboards showing root placement. A mural of growing trees spans the backdrop, symbolizing growth and care. PANEL-3:Educational displays featuring infographic panels on deforestation and climate solutions. A sculptural globe surrounded by miniature trees dominates the center, while touchscreens cycle through conservation videos. Recycled art installations flank the space, crafted from plastic bottles and reclaimed wood. PANEL-4:A shaded seating area with circular wooden benches under fabric canopies printed with leaf patterns. Foldable tables hold seed-paper crafting kits, and a small stage hosts a speaker discussing sustainability. Attendees chat while surrounded by hanging planters with trailing ivy. PANEL-5:A refreshment station offering tree-shaped cookies, herb-infused drinks in biodegradable cups, and fruit skewers arranged like saplings. Burlap tablecloths feature embroidered tree motifs, and chalkboard menus list eco-friendly ingredients. A banner above reads 'Nourish Nature' in leafy lettering.

instruction: Please provide a plan for a Tree Planting Day event. Generate 5 images showing the decoration, activity, and food areas and so on.
sub_caption: Entrance Decoration: A welcoming arch made of intertwined branches and vines, adorned with colorful leaves and small potted plants. Green banners with "Tree Planting Day" hang from the arch. Rows of various seedlings in biodegradable pots line the pathway, creating an inviting green corridor for guests to walk through.

Tree-Planting Experience Area: A spacious outdoor section with marked planting spots and stacks of young trees ready for planting. Volunteers in green t-shirts assist participants. Educational signs explain proper planting techniques and tree care. A variety of shovels, watering cans, and gardening gloves are neatly organized on tables for easy access.

Environmental Protection Displays: Interactive booths showcasing different aspects of environmental conservation. One display features a miniature ecosystem in a glass terrarium. Another has a "Guess the Tree Species" game with leaf samples. A recycling station demonstrates proper waste sorting, while a solar panel exhibit shows renewable energy in action.

Guest Seating Area: A shaded zone with eco-friendly seating options. Benches made from reclaimed wood, large tree stumps serving as natural chairs, and picnic blankets spread on grassy areas. Potted plants and small trees create a garden-like atmosphere. A central stage area is set up for speakers and presentations.

Refreshment Station: A rustic wooden counter offering Tree Planting Day-themed snacks and drinks. Green smoothies in reusable cups, tree-shaped cookies, and fruit skewers resembling miniature trees. A large dispenser filled with infused water decorated with floating lemon slices and mint leaves. Compostable plates and utensils are neatly stacked nearby.

prompt: SIX-PANEL Images with a 2x3 grid layout vibrant music festival celebration with coordinated event areas.All images share a lively, colorful festival atmosphere with cohesive design elements like string lights, bold signage, and crowds of attendees. instruction: Please provide a plan for a music festival celebration. Generate 6 images showing the decoration, stage setup, and activity areas and so on
sub_caption: A massive main stage dominates the festival grounds, featuring towering speaker stacks, dazzling LED screens, and an intricate lighting rig. Technicians are busy testing equipment while stagehands make final adjustments to the backdrop. The stage is set against a backdrop of trees, creating an amphitheater-like atmosphere.

Three smaller stages are scattered across the festival area, each with its own unique design. One has a rustic, wooden structure for folk and acoustic acts, another features neon lights for electronic music, and the third has a urban graffiti aesthetic for hip-hop performances. Musicians are doing sound checks on each stage.

A bustling food court area filled with colorful food trucks and stalls. Vendors are preparing a variety of cuisines, from gourmet burgers to vegan options. A central bar area is stocked with craft beers and cocktail ingredients. Strings of lights are being hung overhead to create a festive atmosphere as night falls.

Multiple seating zones are set up throughout the grounds. There's a grassy hill with picnic blankets, a area with comfortable bean bags under shade sails, and several clusters of tables and chairs. Near the relaxation areas, charging stations for phones and a few quiet tents for those needing a break from the noise are being set up.

A vibrant marketplace area features rows of tents selling band merchandise, local artisan crafts, and festival souvenirs. Nearby, large-scale art installations are being assembled, including a giant guitar sculpture and an interactive light display. Artists are putting finishing touches on murals that will serve as popular photo spots.

Security personnel are conducting a final walkthrough of the festival grounds, checking entry points and setting up bag check stations. Medical tents are being stocked with supplies, and information booths are being prepared with maps and schedules. Staff members are testing the festival app to ensure all attendees can access real-time updates and navigation assistance.

instruction: Please provide a plan for a craft fair. Generate 6 images showing the setup process and key areas and so on.
sub_caption: A bird's-eye view of an empty fairground with chalk outlines marking vendor booth spaces. Numbered squares are arranged in neat rows, with larger sections grouped by craft categories like "Pottery," "Textiles," and "Woodworking." A person with a clipboard is seen walking between the marked areas, finalizing the layout.

A partially set-up demonstration area with several workstations. One station shows a potter's wheel with clay and tools nearby, another has a loom with colorful threads, and a third features woodworking equipment. Signage above each area indicates the type of craft being demonstrated. A few craftspeople are setting up their materials and equipment.

A spacious indoor area divided into several workshop spaces. Each space has tables and chairs arranged in a semicircle facing a main demonstration table. Craft supplies like paints, brushes, fabric, and beads are neatly organized on shelves along the walls. A schedule board lists various workshops throughout the day.

A charming food court area with rustic wooden stalls and string lights overhead. Food vendors are setting up, offering artisanal breads, locally-sourced produce, and handcrafted beverages. Picnic tables with colorful handmade tablecloths are scattered around, and a central area features a large sculpture made from recycled materials.

A grand central pavilion with high ceilings and natural light. Inside, pedestals and display cases showcase exceptional craft pieces from featured artisans. Spotlights illuminate intricate jewelry, elaborate quilts, and stunning glasswork. Informational placards beside each piece provide details about the artist and their techniques.

An overview of the entire craft fair just before opening. Colorful banners and signs guide visitors to different areas. Volunteers in matching t-shirts are doing final checks on booths and displays. The fair is a vibrant mix of vendor stalls, demonstration areas, workshops, and central displays, all ready to showcase the best of local craftsmanship.

instruction: Please provide a plan for an academic conference. Generate 6 images showing the setup process and key areas and so on.
sub_caption: A spacious presentation room with rows of chairs facing a large projector screen. At the front, there's a podium with a microphone and laptop. Along the sides, you can see speakers mounted on the walls and a control panel for audiovisual equipment. Natural light streams in through partially covered windows, creating an ideal environment for presentations.

A welcoming registration area with multiple desks staffed by friendly personnel. Each desk has a computer, name tag printer, and conference materials. Nearby, colorful information booths display maps, schedules, and local attractions. A large banner with the conference logo hangs prominently above, and potted plants add a touch of greenery to the space.

A well-lit open area with rows of poster boards arranged in a grid pattern. Each board has a spotlight above it and ample space for researchers to stand and discuss their work. Small tables with water pitchers and glasses are placed strategically throughout. The floor is carpeted to reduce noise, and directional signs help attendees navigate the poster sessions.

A bright dining hall with round tables adorned with simple centerpieces. A buffet line along one wall offers a variety of food options. High-top tables are scattered around for those who prefer to stand and mingle. In one corner, there's a coffee and refreshment station. The room's layout encourages movement and interaction, with plenty of space between tables for networking conversations.

A bustling exhibit hall with booths from various academic publishers and professional organizations. Each booth has eye-catching displays of books, journals, and promotional materials. Some booths feature interactive touchscreens or small presentation areas. Wide aisles allow for easy movement, and comfortable seating areas are interspersed throughout for impromptu meetings or rest.

A conference organizer with a clipboard standing in the main lobby, surveying the completed setup. Around them, you can see glimpses of the presentation rooms, registration area, poster session space, dining hall, and exhibit area. Staff members are making final adjustments, ensuring signage is correct, testing equipment, and arranging welcome packets. The atmosphere is one of anticipation and professionalism as the conference prepares to welcome attendees.

A presentation area with rows of chairs facing a raised stage adorned with the charity’s logo. A podium and large screen for speeches or videos anchor the space. Overhead string lights create a welcoming ambiance while maintaining professionalism.

Donation stations equipped with tablets for digital payments, cash collection boxes, and contactless card readers. Staff in matching uniforms assist donors, while wall-mounted infographics explain how contributions will be used. The setup balances efficiency and transparency.

An overview of the entire event space, capturing coordinators conducting final checks. Decorations, signage, and activity zones are harmoniously arranged to reflect unity. Subtle details like branded tablecloths and mission-focused wall decals reinforce the charity’s identity.

Style.Color Palette Consistency: The color scheme should be consistent across all images, reflecting the charity's branding or a unified theme (e.g., using specific brand colors in decorations and displays) to maintain a professional and cohesive visual identity.
Style.Atmosphere and Tone Uniformity: The overall atmosphere (e.g., cheerful, sophisticated, welcoming) should be consistent in all images. This includes lighting, background ambience, and the general mood conveyed to viewers.
Style.Detail Level Harmony: The level of detail in each scene (decoration, information booths, auction displays, seating, donation stations) should be consistent, ensuring that no single area appears overly detailed or simplistic compared to others.

Logic.Spatial Arrangement Coherence: The spatial arrangement of different areas (entrance, information booths, auction, seating, donation stations) should logically flow within the event space across images, reflecting a planned layout that is easy for attendees to navigate.
Logic.Activity-Appropriate Setting: Each activity area (e.g., auction, donation) should be depicted with logically consistent settings and equipment. For example, the auction area should show displays and bidding materials, while the donation area should have secure collection points.
Logic.Text Description Relevance: The visual elements in each image must accurately reflect the associated text descriptions (e.g., the welcoming entrance should visually communicate the charity's mission; donation stations should display multiple payment options).

Identity.Branding Consistency: The charity's logo, name, and branding elements should be consistently and accurately displayed across all images (e.g., on banners, signage, donation boxes) to reinforce brand recognition and credibility.
Identity.Mission Representation: The visual elements (e.g., imagery, text, decorations) should consistently reflect the charity's mission and values, reinforcing its purpose and conveying its goals to potential donors and supporters.
Identity.Thematic Uniformity: The overall theme of the event should be visually apparent and consistently executed across all images, ensuring a unified message that resonates with the charity's identity and objectives (e.g., focusing on children's welfare, environmental sustainability, etc.).

instruction: Please provide a plan for a charity event. Generate 6 images showing the decoration, activity, and donation areas and so on.
sub_caption: A welcoming entrance arch decorated with colorful balloons and banners. A large, eye-catching sign displays the charity's name and mission statement. Volunteers in matching t-shirts greet attendees with warm smiles and informational pamphlets.

A row of neatly arranged information booths with vibrant displays and interactive touchscreens. Each booth represents a different aspect of the charity's work. Nearby, a volunteer station is set up with a registration desk and a schedule board showing various activities throughout the event.

An elegant auction area with glass display cases showcasing valuable items and experiences up for bid. Silent auction tables are arranged with bid sheets and pens. A stage is set up for the live auction, complete with a podium and large screens to display items.

A spacious seating area with rows of chairs facing a main stage. The stage is equipped with a podium, microphones, and large screens for presentations. Banners with inspiring quotes and charity success stories hang on either side of the stage.

Multiple donation stations set up with tablets for digital payments, cash boxes for physical donations, and card readers for credit card transactions. Each station is staffed by a volunteer ready to assist. Informational posters nearby explain how donations will be used to support the charity's cause.

An overview of the entire event space, showcasing how all areas flow together cohesively. Decorations, signage, and color schemes consistently reflect the charity's branding and values. Volunteers and staff members are positioned throughout, ensuring a smooth and engaging experience for all attendees.
